attributes.action: Support a petition in support of a petition against pointless petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are so many petitions of a vague and indeterminate aim upon no.10's website that they may detract from the validity of other, perfectly commendable petitions. I call for a petition to ascertain the level of support for a petition against the lodging of such petitions (while recognising the democratic right of anyone to lodge a petition against said aim).

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
